name: Damngud Design Studio
tagline: We are design thinkers and brand story tellers
description:
Damngud Design Studio is a UX/UI, web design, graphic design and branding company based in Bangalore, India. 
We’re a team of creative thinkers, strategists, problem solvers, designers, copywriters and digital experts all dedicated to developing the highest quality creative, results-driven work that changes the game for our clients.
Our strategies and outputs are always tailor-made for your specific needs and requirements for both offline and online mediums.
